slides.title: Capacity Planning
slides.description: An R Shiny clinical capacity planning tool replacing Excel, enabling scenario simulation from planners to vice presidents at a major pharmaceutical company.

slides.title: Sales Pules
slides.description: We helped Digital Fuel Capital transform an internal Shiny prototype into a branded, scalable BI platform. We redesigned the UI/UX, unified fragmented workflows, implemented secure access, and optimized performance—delivering a product experience that turned users into ambassadors and accelerated portfolio-wide adoption.

slides.title: iCLEANED
slides.description: R Shiny tool simulating livestock scenarios and environmental impacts (GHG, water, land) for CGIAR, enabling researchers to analyze and visualize complex agricultural data.

slides.title: AGRA Dashboard
slides.description: Collaborated with Mathematica to deliver a dynamic, self-generating R Shiny dashboard with real-time data customization and instant UI updates, enabling easy access agricultural KPIs, interpretation guides, and seamless exploration.
